function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Under-reporting of data due to mass panic in low-resource countries","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of the effectiveness of NPHIs, leading to uninformed policy decisions","Mitigation":"Improve data collection methods and invest in data infrastructure in low-resource countries","Technologies":"Data analytics, data validation tools, and data sharing platforms","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, and researchers","Owner":"Government agencies, international organizations"},{"Description":"Reliability and validity of publicly available data from countries with poor data infrastructure","Impact":"Unreliable evidence for the effectiveness of NPHIs, hindering the assessment of the pandemic response","Mitigation":"Implement data validation processes and improve data collection methods in low-resource countries","Technologies":"Data validation tools, data quality assessment software, and data governance platforms","People":"Research institutions, public health organizations, and data scientists","Owner":"International organizations, public-private partnerships"},{"Description":"Observational nature of included studies and lack of clinical trials due to the pandemic","Impact":"Limited ability to establish causal inference and assess the effectiveness of NPHIs in a controlled setting","Mitigation":"Encourage retrospective analysis and modeling to strengthen evidence, and promote ethical and feasible approaches to conduct clinical trials during public health emergencies","Technologies":"Data modeling and simulation tools, retrospective analysis software, and ethical review frameworks","People":"Researchers, public health officials, and ethical review boards","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, and regulatory authorities"}]}
